name: Balance of Kingdoms (itch)
description:
Build, Balance and Battle!

Balance of Kingdoms is a mixture of Real Time Strategy and Physics Puzzle genres and will have a focus on 1v1 battles with many different game modes. 

In the free Singleplayer Prototype you can play 3 different single-player game modes:

- Survival

Build a kingdom which can defend from incoming waves of enemies. 

- Build Challenge

Complete challenges against the clock.

- Freeplay

Build a kingdom with no time limits or enemies.
